room_title: Escape room "The Secret of The Tower Keeper" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Val was awesome to work with. I booked my daughter’s 15th Birthday party and everyone had an awesome time. The Secret of the Tower Keeper was a great room and the location is just perfect. I love how they were able to keep the original historic structure and orchestrate a cool game around it! Highly recommend if you are looking to have a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Secret of The Tower Keeper" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Myself and 9 friends did the Secret of the Tower Keeper, what a blast. Great challenge and great team building in a really cool historical location

room_title: Escape room "The Secret of The Tower Keeper" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Absolutely fun and exciting! I did the “secret of the tower keeper” with my coworkers and we all got to know each other better. Everyone gets to help and be part of the group whether you are good or not. The clue master also will help you along. Be thorough and be open to anything. Clues can vary from codes to numbers or pictures so there's something for everyone. Highly recommended.
